author: kilasuit
body:
As per the below Screenshot from PSv7 there is still a pointer to PSv6 Docs
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6355225/59620857-d1221500-9125-11e9-908c-375a8b3171a4.png)


this should be changed prior to v7 becoming GA

comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body: There's a PR that changes this to https://aka.ms/powershell.  PR #9775

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: PS v7 points to PS v6 docs
